slip first stitch knitwise slip next stitch knitwise knit these two stitches together through the back loop sl slip_stitch all slip stitches not attached to ssk s are slipped purlwise see how to s on 3rd page for in depth explanation of the kitchener st abbreviations cuff & leg k - knit rs - right side p - purl ws - wrong side cast on 64 sts join in the round place round - round st s - stitch es a stitch marker to indicate bor sl - slip_stitch pm - place marker bor - beginning of round round 1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to eor eor - end of round this is your ribbing pattern k2tog - knit 2 sts together repeat round 1 until cuff measures ssk - slip slip knit 5 5 14cm p2tog - purl 2 sts together st st - stockinette stitch make a note of how many row it took decrease -
